name: Camera Bag
description: Camera bags feature toploading openings for easy access to their camera and gear and are generally carried over the shoulder or hand strap.

name: DSLR

name: Camera Body
description: Body only means the camera comes without a lens. The camera will be unable to take a photo without the lens. You will have to buy a lens separately.
